text: Tadashi Fukushima (; born 1 January 1944) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Okayama
title: Tadashi Fukushima (equestrian)
